quotes.quote: I have always found that mercy bears richer fruits than strict justice.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Courage is of no value unless accompanied by justice; yet if all men became just, there would be no need for courage.
quotes.author: Agesilaus the Second

quotes.quote: The sword of justice has no scabbard.
quotes.author: Antione De Riveral

quotes.quote: It is in justice that the ordering of society is centered.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Justice does not come from the outside. It comes from inner peace.
quotes.author: Barbara Hall

quotes.quote: In the state of nature, indeed, all men are born equal, but they cannot continue in this equality. Society makes them lose it, and they recover it only by the protection of the laws.
quotes.author: Domitus Ulpian

quotes.quote: Justice is the constant and perpetual will to allot to every man his due.
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.quote: It is the spirit and not the form of law that keeps justice alive.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Justice is a contract of expediency, entered upon to prevent men harming or being harmed.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Military justice is to justice what military music is to music.
quotes.author: Henri-Fr�d�ric Amiel

quotes.quote: Liberty, equality - bad principles! The only true principle for humanity is justice; and justice to the feeble is protection and kindness.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Under a government which imprisons unjustly, the true place for a just man is also a prison.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: If it were not for injustice, men would not know justice.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Many that live deserve death. And some die that deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then be not too eager to deal out death in the name of justice, fearing for your own safety. Even the wise cannot see all ends.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Gossip and reputation make sure that what comes around-a person who is cruel will find that the others are cruel hack to him, and a person who is kind will find others are kind in return. Gossip paired with reciprocity allow karma to work here on earth, not in the next life.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The greatest justice in life is that your vision and looks tend to go simultaneously.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The dead cannot cry out for justice; it is a duty of the living to do so for them.
quotes.author: Pope Pius XI

quotes.quote: Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.author: William Gladstone

quotes.quote: Justice requires that to lawfully constituted Authority there be given that respect and obedience which is its due; that the laws which are made shall be in wise conformity with the common good; and that, as a matter of conscience all men shall render obedience to these laws.
Justice consists not in being neutral between right and wrong, but in finding out the right and upholding it, wherever found, against the wrong.
Justice delayed, is justice denied.
